nodes.text: The Neshig sector lay in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim and contained the Corvanni system. The latter was the site of the astronomical object Corvanni IV. During the Galactic Civil War, the company Gandalom Paramedicinals, Inc. had its corporate headquarters in Gandalom City on Corvanni IV.
The Neshig sector was introduced in the 1994 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplement Galaxy Guide 10: Bounty Hunters, which was written by Rick D. Stuart for West End Games.
